headline: Allegiant July 2025 Traffic Numbers Improve Year Over Year
summary: ALGT's July traffic rose year over year, but capacity outpaced demand, leading to a dip in load factor despite strong growth.

headline: Boeing Director Makes First Stock Purchase
summary: A  Boeing  insider snapped up several thousand shares of the aerospace firm, marking the first purchase of its kind during his time as a director.  Mortimer Buckley, former chairman and CEO of The Vanguard Group, purchased 2,200 shares of common stock for $226.10 each on Aug. 19, for a total of $497,420, according to a Form 4 filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission.  The purchase represents Buckley’s first time buying securities since becoming a Boeing director earlier this year.

headline: Avilease CEO: Boeing Planes Delivery Expected from 2030
summary: PIF-owned Avilease, an aircraft lessor headquartered in Saudi Arabia has put in its first direct order for 30 Boeing planes this year. Edward O'Byrne CEO of Avilease spoke to Bloomberg's Horizons Middle East and Africa anchor Joumanna Bercetche about the aircraft delivery pipeline.
